title: Questionable customer support
body: My account got hacked then the hacker bought $200 worth of RP now I can't do anything about it and it's been 4 days and no response from riot employees I feel like I'm getting screwed by the hacker and riot

replies.body: That's a bit long, and I'd like to take a look at the status of your ticket.  Some extra investigation and legwork might have been required, so it could take a bit. I promise we're on your side and not deliberately trying to screw you.  What's your ticket number?

30300659 I gave you guys what you asked for but never got a response

This is just my alt account since I can't login to my main account and whenever I make a ticket they respond in Spanish on my main email

It looks like you've been responding to Blitzbot, who is not....human.  :x  Based on his response, we're requesting you fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  This will help us investigate your specific recovery without requiring you to login to the ticketing center.  You can just submit whichever email you have access to.  Fill that out, and we'll see you there!
The ticket number is 30314712 if that helps at all
Cool, I confirmed that your ticket has been received!  It's been sent to our account team's queue, and they will investigate as soon as they can.  Hang tight, and we'll reach out in your ticket!
Thank you very much just submitted
